alert.note: Alert for Cass; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 1:40AM CDT until July 15 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Eastern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Southeastern Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 140 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gardner, or 22 miles northwest of Fargo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gardner around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Argusville, Georgetown, Brooktree Park, Prosper and Harwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 61 and 95. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 336 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 5. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
